jitNetworkAccessPolicies.description: Create a policy for protecting resources using Just-in-Time access control

___provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the Just-in-Time policy.

_88Location.description: Describes an Azure resource with location

___location.description: Location where the resource is stored

___endTimeUtc.description: The date & time at which the request ends in UTC

items.description: IP address or CIDR, for example "192.168.0.3" or "192.168.0.0/16".

___allowedSourceAddressPrefix.description: Mutually exclusive with the "allowedSourceAddressPrefixes" parameter. Should be an IP address or CIDR, for example "192.168.0.3" or "192.168.0.0/16".

___statusReason.description: A description of why the `status` has its value

___nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.
